userNav.signOutError: Failed to sign out. Please try again.

dashboard.welcomeSubtitle: Here's a quick summary of your account. Go ahead and explore our services.
dashboard.welcomeAlertDesc: You don't have any orders yet. Start your journey now by exploring our services or adding funds to your account.

quickOrderForm.title: Quick Launch Zone
quickOrderForm.description: Create a new order in seconds.
quickOrderForm.quantityErrorDesc: The quantity must be between {{min}} and {{max}}.
quickOrderForm.insufficientFundsDesc: Your balance (${{balance}}) is not enough to cover the order cost (${{cost}}).
quickOrderForm.successDesc: Your order is now being processed.

massOrder.title: Mass Order
massOrder.description: Save time by placing multiple orders at once.
massOrder.inputDescription: Each line is a separate order with the format:
massOrder.discountNote: Note: Your '{{rankName}}' rank discount ({{discount}}%) will be automatically applied to the total cost.
massOrder.emptyFieldError: The mass order field cannot be empty.
massOrder.dataLoadingError: Cannot process orders, services data is still loading.

results.fullSuccessDesc: All your orders have been processed successfully.
results.partialSuccessDesc: Some of your orders were processed successfully, while others failed.

errors.quantityOutOfBounds: Quantity is out of bounds (Min: {{min}}, Max: {{max}}).
errors.noValidOrders: No valid orders found to process.
errors.insufficientFunds: Insufficient funds. Total cost: ${{totalCost}}, your balance: ${{balance}}.
errors.permissionError: Transaction failed due to a permission error. Check security rules.

ordersPage.title: Order History
ordersPage.description: Here you can view all your past and current orders and track their status.
ordersPage.searchPlaceholder: Search by ID, service, or link...
ordersPage.noMatchDescription: We couldn't find any orders that match your current search and filter criteria.

adminUsers.title: User Management
adminUsers.description: View, edit, and search for all users in the system.

analytics.title: Your Account Analytics
analytics.description: A deep dive into your activity and spending for valuable insights.

noData.title: Not Enough Data to Analyze
noData.description: Start placing some orders, and we'll begin generating custom charts and insights for you here.

dailySpend.title: Daily Spending
dailySpend.description: A look at your daily expenditure over the last week.

categorySpend.title: Spending by Category
categorySpend.description: The distribution of your spending across different service categories.

api.title: API Access
api.description: Automate your orders by integrating our services directly into your applications.

endpoints.title: Endpoint
endpoints.description: All API requests should be sent as POST requests to the following endpoint:

add.title: Add Order (add)
add.description: This action is used to place a new order.

status.title: Order Status (status)
status.description: This action is used to check the status of a specific order.

services.title: Services List (services)
services.description: This action is used to get a full list of all available services.

balance.title: Balance (balance)
balance.description: This action is used to check your current account balance.

add.params.service: The ID of the service you want to order.
add.params.link: The target link for the order.

status.params.order: The ID of the order you want to check.

responses.title: Example Responses
responses.description: Below are examples of the JSON responses you can expect from the API.
responses.addSuccess: Successful response when adding a new order. The number is the new order ID.
responses.statusSuccess: Successful response when checking an order status.
responses.servicesSuccess: Successful response when requesting the services list.
responses.balanceSuccess: Successful response when requesting the balance.
responses.errorIncorrect: Error response in case of missing or invalid parameters.
responses.errorFunds: Error response in case of insufficient funds to place the order.
responses.errorKey: Error response in case the API key is invalid.

servicesPage.title: Full Service Catalog
servicesPage.description: Browse and search all available services we offer.
servicesPage.searchPlaceholder: Search by ID or service name...
servicesPage.noDescription: No description available for this service.
